sys_email_canned_message.body:
Hello,
 
I work in Optum Consumer Affairs and received a call/complaint from ${contact_first_name} ${contact_last_name} that was seeking assistance from the Executive Offices. We appreciate the many competing demands on your time. However, the expectation of the executive offices is that we resolve these cases on an urgent basis. I would like to get this resolved as quickly as possible, on or before ${due_date}. 
 
Please provide the following:
• Member Name: ${member_first_name} ${member_last_name} 
• Member ID: ${member_number}
• Policy #: ${member_policy_number}
• DOB: ${member_dob}
• Member’s Address:  ${member_address_1} ${member_address_2} ${member_city}, ${member_state} ${member_postal_code}
• Funding: ${member_funding}
• Situs: ${market_state_of_situs}
• ERISA or non-ERISA:  ${market_erisa}
 
Please confirm receipt and let me know who will be handling the issue.
 
 **For BBB complaints, our office will respond to the BBB, however, we need a copy of the member/provider response from you in order to close our file.
 
Thank you in advance for your assistance.
 
Sincerely,
sys_email_canned_message.title: CalPERS Catamaran Futurescripts SCA
